sections.heading: center, defined.Regional center means a state hospital for the mentally ill as designated in section 83-305

sections.text:
71-911.Regional center, defined.

Regional center means a state hospital for the mentally ill as designated in section 83-305.

SourceLaws 1976, LB 806, § 7;R.S.1943, (1999), § 83-1007;Laws 2004, LB 1083, § 31.
